author: nerder92
title: Show HN: Access management app for small businesses
description: Hello HN,With a group of friends, we are looking for some validation on an idea we got about implementing an app that will help small shops & businesses manage the booking of timeslots to visit - the tool will help pharmacies, small markets, local shops, etc.…
